name: Disrupting Fake Gurus and Occultists
description: Exposing fraudulent spiritual leaders, deceptive occult networks, and cult-like manipulation tactics.

cards.title: Spotting Manipulative Gurus and Spiritual Leaders
cards.description: How to identify spiritual leaders who are part of the control system.
bulletpoints: Analyzing speech patterns and persuasion tactics.
The role of ‘love-bombing’ in cult recruitment.
How false humility is used as a deceptive tactic.
cards.summaryText: Breaks down grooming language, love-bomb cycles, and faux humility that signal manipulative gurus.

cards.title: Exposing False Channeling and Mediumship
cards.description: Understanding how channeled messages are often hijacked to mislead seekers.
bulletpoints: How negative entities masquerade as benevolent beings.
How vague prophecies and unverifiable claims create dependency.
cards.summaryText: Uncovers hijacked channeling, conflicting messaging, and dependency loops built on vague prophecy.

cards.title: Dismantling Occult Disinformation and New Age Deception
cards.description: How occult knowledge is distorted and used for psychological control.
bulletpoints: Exposing false secret societies masquerading as esoteric wisdom keepers.
How elite groups infiltrate spiritual movements to mislead seekers.
Spotting patterns of deception in astrology, numerology, and divination.
cards.summaryText: Reveals counterfeit esoteric orders, elite infiltration plays, and divination red flags used to control seekers.
